definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 树木还能保持水分防止土壤侵蚀。

sentences.english: This article mainly illustrated the application of soil erosion estimation method based on Geographic Information System (GIS) and remote sensing (RS) technology.
sentences.chinese: 研究了土壤侵蚀定量遥感方法在浙江省仙居县的应用。

sentences.english: This acts as a breakwater and protects the islands from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 这也起到了防浪堤的作用并且保护岛屿不被海水侵蚀。

sentences.english: The bed of a river is partly worn away by corrosive action.
sentences.chinese: 河床部分地就是被这种侵蚀作用冲蚀的。

sentences.english: This paper dwells the concepts of retrogressive aggradation and the datum of erosion.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了溯源淤积和侵蚀基准面的概念。

sentences.english: Elephant trunk-like dust pillars point towards the hot blue stars and are tell-tale signs of their eroding effect.
sentences.chinese: 指向蓝色热星的象鼻状尘埃柱是辐射侵蚀效果的证据。

sentences.english: In each kind of food includes the massive toxin are corroding each person's health.
sentences.chinese: 各类食品里含有的大量毒素侵蚀着每一个人的健康。

sentences.english: Their ectoplasmic humour often overwhelms their sense of reason.
sentences.chinese: 他们的理智经常受到灵外质的侵蚀。

sentences.english: Water and soil loss is an important landforms evolution course.
sentences.chinese: 水土流失其实是一种主要的侵蚀地貌演化过程。

sentences.english: Economic weakness is leaching into their stock portfolios.
sentences.chinese: 人们的股票投资组合也受到了经济疲软的侵蚀。

sentences.english: But the desert is encroaching on this metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 但是，沙漠正侵蚀着这个大都市。

sentences.english: Soil erosion and sub-humid forest region in southern India.
sentences.chinese: 土壤侵蚀与半湿润森林区，南印度。

sentences.english: But he said erosion of the U.S. manufacturing base 'is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 但他说，美国制造业基础的侵蚀是不可逆转的。

sentences.english: Can you resist erosion of the rain.
sentences.chinese: 你能抵挡得住天雨的侵蚀吗。

sentences.english: This crowd who could hide and, once again, eat you.
sentences.chinese: 这喧嚣谁能躲得及，再一次，侵蚀你。

sentences.english: The deposits are grouped close to the present-day erosional edge of Kombolgie Formation rocks.
sentences.chinese: 矿床集中于靠近科姆波尔吉地层岩的现代侵蚀前沿。

definition: to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
to make (military) incursions/to invade/to intrude into/to trespass/to gain unauthorized access (computing)
(lit. and fig.) to permeate/to seep into/(of a product, idea etc) to penetrate (in a population)/(of hostile forces) to infiltrate/(chemistry) osmosis
to nibble away at (as silkworm consume leaves)/fig. to embezzle progressively
